div.head: Plates
div.p:
svasti śrīmatāṃ sakala-jagad-abhiṣṭūyamāna-mānavya-sagotrāṇāṃ hāritī
putrāṇāṃ kauśiki-vara-prasāda-labdha-rājyānāṃ mātṛ-gaṇa-paripālitānāṃ
bhagavan-nārāyaṇa-prasaāda-sāamāsaādita-varāhalāñchanaānām aśvame
dhāvabhṛtha-snānāa-pavitrīkṛta-vapuṣāṃ caḷukyānāṃ kula-jaladhi-sa
muditendor @@@ nnayavinayavikramopārjitacarāca… 6. …va[lla]bhamahārājapriya(ā)nujasyendrasamā…
1. ndrabhaṭṭ[āraka]sya smaraṇakaya(?) … 2. ndrama.dagandhādhivāsitasakaladigmaṇḍalasya nānāśāstrābhya(ā)sopa.r 3. … vimalaviśālabuddhe[s] tyāgobāryya(audāryya?)dhairyyakā(?)diguṇāla[ṃ] 4. [k]ṛ[ta]sya{ḥ} śrīviṣṇuvarddhanamahārājasya priyatanayaḥ samati… 5. pitrā guṇaśaktisampannaḥ ānvīkṣikyādividya(ā)prayogeṣu vijayasiddhi[r a] 6. sidhāraṇanamitaripunṛpatimakuṭataṭaghaṭitānekamaṇikiraṇarāgara[ṃjita?]…
Somdev
A: 1:svasti śrīmatāṃ sakalajagadabhipūjayamā[na]māna[vyasagotrāṇāṃ hārīti-]\\ 2:putrāṇāṃ kauśikivaraprasādalabdharājyāṇāṃ mātṛgaṇaparipāli[tānāṃ] \\ 3:bhagavannārāyaṇaprasādas{ā}māsditavarāharalañchanā+++śva\\ 4:medhāvabhṛtasnānapavitrīkṛtavapuṣāṃ cālukyānā[ṃ] kula[m alaṃkariṣṇoḥ]\\ 5: mudite *n nayavinayavikramopajāta[…]\\ 6:+yavaprabhamahārājā priya[nu]jasyendrasamā[…]\\
B 1: [dre]++++sya ssaraṇekasa…\\ 2: +ya++gandhādhivāsitasa[ka]ladi[ś*ṇ]ūlasya nānā śāstrāny as[ope*ra]\\ 3: hi[ta]vimalaviśālabuddhe tyāgo [dh]āryya[śau]ryyak[ā]ntyādiguṇālaṃ\\ 4: kṛtasyaḥ śrīViṣṇuvarddhanamahārājasya priyatanayaḥ samati[krāṃ]ta\\ 5: pi[tṝ]guṇaśaktisampannaḥ ānvīkṣikyādividy[ā]prayogeṣu vijayasiddhi[r a]\\ 6: sidhāraṇanamitaripunṛpatimakuṭata[ṭayaṭimaṇaka]maṇikiraṇa[…]\\

app.note: In the photo, the ring completely obscures the text before the hole. It seems quite certain that there is at least one character here, but bha may instead be lost to damage at the end of line 2.
Again, text to the left of the hole is not visible. Possibly, me may be here instead of being lost at the end of line 3.

This segment of text is very hard to read because of glare in the closeup photo of the page. One photo of two facing pages shows it without glare, but in quite poor resolution. The body of mu is indiscernible here but may be clear in the original plate. The remaining characters can be confidently identified in this latter photo, except for r (attached to the following nna), which may have been omitted in the original.
